Articles.Content:
I'm starting to pull my hair out at this point:

Can someone PLEASE explain how to set up orbital rendezvous using the current maneuver planner? I used to do it all the time in KSP1, but now I'm seeing multiple intercept points for intercept 1 and intercept 2 at the same time on different orbit paths.

 

How can the Target Position @ Intercept 1 be in two places at the same time?? I'm losing my mind!
This looks like a BUG. There have been many issues with orbit path constructs and manuever points identified already.

Yeah I'm seeing the same thing. 2 orbits that do not intersect, yet "i:1" is displayed, twice. 

I just for the life of me cannot get a decent encounter.
